alert.note: Alert for Amherst; Bedford; Campbell (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 02 at 2:46PM EDT by NWS Blacksburg
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of northern Appomattox, northern Campbell, northeastern Bedford, and southern Amherst Counties and the City of Lynchburg through 315 PM EDT... At 246 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Riverville to near Madison Heights to near Bedford. Movement was southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Lynchburg... Bedford... Amherst... Appomattox... Big Island... Bent Creek... and Concord. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Locally heavy rain will quickly reduce visibility and result in ponding of water on roadways, standing water in low lying areas, and minor flooding of creeks, streams, and areas of poor drainage. Drivers are urged to slow down and use extra caution to avoid hydroplaning.
